newsitem.title: UK: INSIGHT - Williams shares to reach 375p.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - Williams shares to reach 375p.

text.p: DAY'S RANGE * SUPPORT * RESTNCE* MA-25 * MA-200
+ Shares in Williams Holdings look set to climb tentatively to 375p following a chart breakout from 350p, technical analysts said.
+ Positive factors for the stock include a rising 200-day moving average line and breakout on its price-relative chart.
+ The company will announce its half-year results on September 10.

In a run-up ahead of the company's half-year results on September 10, the shares have broken through resistance at 350p but they will not be able to withstand prolonged general market weakness, added Marshall.
Positive factors for the stock include a steadily rising 200-day moving average and breakout from a relative-price chart of the share price divided by the share price.
Between April and August the share price was constrained between two converging trendlines which made a symmetrical triangle pattern.
The shares broke through the upper trendline in August and calculations from the the triangle indicate a target of 370p for the shares following the breakout.
This was estimated by adding the maximum width of the triangle of 35p to the point of breakout, at 335p.
"The shares have been underperforming for several years," said Marshall. "But there now looks to be a technical case for holding on (to the shares) as the uptrend develops."
